scripts.dev: lsof -ti:${PORT:-3000} | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && PORT=${PORT:-3000} bun demo/server.ts
scripts.build: bun run build.ts && bunx dts-bundle-generator -o dist/arena-2d.d.ts src/index.ts
scripts.lint: bunx biome check src/ tests/ demo/ build.ts
scripts.lint:fix: bunx biome check --write src/ tests/ demo/ build.ts
scripts.quality: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun test
